author: cnbc.com
title: Hyster-Yale Materials Handling Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
CLEVELAND, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Hyster-Yale Materials Handling, Inc. (NYSE: HY) today announced that the Board of Directors declared a regular cash dividend of 30.25 cents per share. The dividend is payable on both the Class A and Class B Common Stock, and will be paid March 15, 2018 to stockholders of record at the close of business on March 1, 2018.
